text: Mach, Jisasɨv kaz wɨram akŋ anchɨ akŋ hamb isaŋ ŋgarɨwɨmŋgɨmar. Avɨz Jisasɨv eŋka ahins mban ŋe ñaŋ sɨhawarohe were Yakŋ Ohɨrah ya imbɨr eŋgwamar. Ave mbɨ eŋka mban ŋaŋepev mbɨkɨr sezɨr hamb wɨram akŋ anchɨ akŋ mban eŋkwanamŋgɨz are ndɨŋ eŋgwamar. Eŋgwaz mbɨ wɨram akŋ anchɨ akŋ han kɨrɨm eŋkwanamŋgɨmar.
